alert.note: Alert for Cass; Kosciusko; Miami; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 6:45AM EST until February 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Eel River at North Manchester affecting Wabash, Kosciusko, Miami, Whitley and Cass IN Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Eel River at North Manchester. * WHEN...From this morning to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, The river is at flood stage, minor agricultural flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 AM EST Thursday was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 hours.
